title: How to Unlock the Submissive Achievement in Half Life 2

steps.headline: Locate the "trashcan cop", a Combine soldier with serious attitude; he can be found in Point Insertion blocking your path after you have finished talking with Barney.
steps.description: You can't continue without confronting him, so you won't miss him.

steps.headline: Pick up the soda can he drops on the ground.
steps.description: He will tell you to pick it up and put it in the nearby trashcan; you can pick up the soda can by aiming at it with your crosshairs and pressing X on your Xbox 360 controller.

steps.headline: Dispose of the soda can in the trashcan as requested.
steps.description: To place the can in the trash, hold the can over the opening of the bin and press X on your controller again. Alternatively, you can throw the can into the bin by aiming the crosshairs at the opening on the trashcan and pressing the Right Trigger. Make sure you aim precisely, as you will not get the achievement if you do not get the can in the trash.

steps.headline: Walk past the soldier freely.
steps.description: You have passed his test and you can now move on. Hang your head in shame - this was your chance to rebel against the man.

steps.headline: Check your Xbox 360 gamerscore and achievement statistics and you will see that the Submissive achievement has been unlocked for 5 gamerscore.
steps.description: It is represented by a trash can with a soda can going into it.

text: Locate the "trashcan cop", a Combine soldier with serious attitude; he can be found in Point Insertion blocking your path after you have finished talking with Barney. You can't continue without confronting him, so you won't miss him. Pick up the soda can he drops on the ground. He will tell you to pick it up and put it in the nearby trashcan; you can pick up the soda can by aiming at it with your crosshairs and pressing X on your Xbox 360 controller. Dispose of the soda can in the trashcan as requested. To place the can in the trash, hold the can over the opening of the bin and press X on your controller again. Alternatively, you can throw the can into the bin by aiming the crosshairs at the opening on the trashcan and pressing the Right Trigger. Make sure you aim precisely, as you will not get the achievement if you do not get the can in the trash. Walk past the soldier freely. You have passed his test and you can now move on. Hang your head in shame - this was your chance to rebel against the man. Check your Xbox 360 gamerscore and achievement statistics and you will see that the Submissive achievement has been unlocked for 5 gamerscore. It is represented by a trash can with a soda can going into it.
